Company: Saint Louis University, Tenet Healthcare Corporation, SSM Health Care
Description of incident: On August 8, Saint Louis University learned that about 10 employees had their direct deposit information changed after several malicious phishing emails were sent to employees on July 25.  About 20 phishing emails were sent and several employees provided their account information. No unauthorized transactions have occurred because of the email scam.  Additionally, patients who were treated or reviewed at facilities owned by the Tenet Healthcare Corporation or SSM Health Care may have had their information exposed.
